title: Thermometer for Kids Bath Thermometer 2 Pack，Safety Liquid Crystal Material（No Mercury，No Glass），More Scientific and Accurate Data, Easy to Use，Waterproof (Water Temperature Stickers)
features: ❤Water temperature stickers no use of traditional materials (mercury, glass to avoid mercury poisoning and glass scratches)，Water temperature stickers Use new non-toxic and environment-friendly liquid crystal materials（characteristics：Waterproof and reusable）

❤Baby weak constitution, bath water temperature once can not meet the requirements, easy to catch a cold or scald，The use of temperature CARDS can better control the temperature, prevent the water temperature is too low or too high, the baby can not retain the consequences（New mother's good helper）

❤The Water temperature stickers made of liquid crystal materials can provide more scientific, safe and accurate data，The Water temperature stickers soak in Water for 15 seconds or more, to achieve the green area, the Water temperature is appropriate，If you don't reach the green area, the water temperature is too low or too high.
❤Method of use：Can Water temperature stickers to stick to the tub profile, Don't tear it off（waterproof），When you add water ，the water level is marked on the card (for reference only).
description: Are you still troubled by your baby's cold or scald due to your inability to accurately control the temperature of the bath water? Are you still afraid of becoming a new mother, afraid your baby will suffer from illness and feel powerless?  ❤Try our AIPINYUE Water temperature stickers!  Designed for sensitive skin babies and new mothers, you won't be disappointed!  ❤ AIPINYUE warm tips：（Safety First！）
